description:
There`s a new transfer student in town, and boy is he a doozy! Will his stuck-up attitude prove too much for Pascal and the rest of class 4-1? Meanwhile, a servant of the dark lord is haunted by demons from his past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Name Is Tenkousei / Perfect Plate
My Name Is Transfer Student / Perfect Plate
マイネームイズ転校生 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート
